website_summaries.verdict: Multipacks of animal-friendly, eco-friendly coconut oil-based soap for the vegan who likes to stock up.
pros: Hypoallergenic formula is gentle on the skin
Hydrates well thanks to its main ingredient: coconut oil
Available in the original formula, fragrance-free, or with soothing aloe vera
cons: Bars don't last as long as other soaps

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap
customer_reviews.text: I like the soap, and I will buy it again. For the people that comment about the soap not lasting long, it is because the soap is not cured for long. To make it last longer, remove a bar of soap from the package and place it on a counter (not in the bathroom) for a week or longer. This dries or cures the soap making it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: A Buettner

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin and hair squeaky clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. I looked high and low for a reasonably priced soap that doesn't use animal by-products or test on animals. Like other reviewers have said the lather is great. I will say the bar does not last nearly as long as my conventional soap. Based on other reviewers I tried it also as a shampoo. I have medium length hair so I wasn't sure if it would work. It does and left my hair and scalp feeling squeaky clean. I feel a little crazy writing a review for a darn soap, but the other reviews helped me make a decision to purchase and hope this helps someone else too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made skin super dry
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this soap. It made my skin extremely dry. I didn't think about it after the first use but after the second and third I knew it had to be the soap. My 12 year old son also used it and he came to me complaining that his hands were dry. When I felt his hands I couldn't believe how dry they were, his hands felt like a grown working man's hands.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a harsh, drying environment and find this fragrance-free Coco Castille cleansing bar to be a perfect alternative to standard soaps. No animal by-products, fragrance free, and cleans wonderfully. Natural soap, excellent foaming and moderately consumed. Takes pine pitch off skin like a good coconut oil should, without being oily! My husband and I love this simple, natural bar in the shower or bath; rinses CLEAN! I have ordered more than once. Suffice it to say, love this product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Soap burns – way too harsh
customer_reviews.text: This soap burns, stings and will dry skin out. And that can’t be healthy...
customer_reviews.author: Solarsherpa

customer_reviews.title: Great natural soap bar.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, we use it for soap and to make baby cloth wipe bits, one bar lasts quite a while, lathers up nice and cleans well, we can use it without worrying about some of the nasty ingredients that other soap products use. We also use liquid Castile Soap for a plethora of things in our house, all around great products.
customer_reviews.author: Thatweirdfamily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soap
customer_reviews.text: This product gets you very clean without drying your skin. I have both dry and sensitive skin and this product is the best thing I've ever used. I bought scentless because I spend time outdoors and do not want to attract bugs. I also smell fabulous enough all on my own. LOL I very much like knowing that I'm not putting anything questionable on my body's largest organ - the skin. If there were six stars, this product would get seven.
customer_reviews.author: VansEI

customer_reviews.title: Not fair trade but a good soap
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping to use this soap as a cheaper alternative to Dr. Bronner’s Castile soap. I e-mailed the company to see if the ingredients are fair trade/sustainable. They are not. The response was that the coconut-derived products come from Asia but are not fair trade. Won’t be buying again. I do like the soap for the most part. It’s not quite as creamy as Dr. Bronner’s.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Burning/tingling feeling
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about using this soap based on other comments, and unfortunately those comments were true. The soap has a burning/tingling feeling when using it. It's not a good peppermint type tingle, it's more of an uncomfortable feeling. I found the soap to be over drying of my skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: dronetp

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars since I could have done better. I’m new to the Kirk soap adventure and knew I didn’t want the blue bar that dries my skin. I found this listed with the white bar picture (I didn’t know the name) so when I received it and saw they used an old picture I figured I could return them and get what I wanted. They don’t take returns so they lost 2 stars because I found the description was misleading.
customer_reviews.author: couvy22

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: After trying many brands of natural soaps this is the only one that lathers and cleans well without leaving residue , for us is the best option if you are looking for a non chemical soap, the only complaint is the packaging because is too much waste and the worst part is some of the bars arrived open so the package comes useless.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Good clean soap WITH NO SCENT and OILS
customer_reviews.text: Face and hands. No ad on's, no perfume just a clean bar of soap.Those with copd are bothered with heavy oils and perfumes. Scents don't mean fresh anyway. Just a CLEAN bar of soap. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned great soap
customer_reviews.text: Kirk's has been making this soft soap for a long time. It's soft, gentle, has a light pleasant fragrance and is inexpensive. Try buying it locally if you can find it. Many stores carry it but not when you, yourself are looking to buy it. And you will never be able to get more than 1-2 bars. Get it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best soap for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. I have very sensitive skin and this product does not irritate. My husband is always looking for scent free products and this is the only scent free I can find. Im unable to find the scent free in a store was so happy to find it here. Best soap ever. Highly recommend to those with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leen

customer_reviews.title: Irritates my skin
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be great for people with sensitive skin. I don't even have sensitive skin, but after using it for a while my skin started irritating me.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Southern

customer_reviews.title: Always dependable
customer_reviews.text: Kirk’s has been a go-to product in our household for over a decade. It does not leave a residue, the unscented product is excellent for sensitive skin. It has been difficult to find in local stores so we were thrilled to find it in the Kirk’s storefront on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MLCJ

customer_reviews.title: Best bar soap
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bar soap I've tried so far. Unlike some other "unscented" soaps which have some unpleasant smells, this is really odorless. This does not dry my skin either. Also, this is an excellent handwashing soap. Very effective and removes stain and odor very well.
customer_reviews.author: JazzA440

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: For some reason these are not fragrance free. Previously i bought a 2 pack and 6 pack which were. These all have strong perfume smell. Amazon disbled the return option for this
customer_reviews.author: Radiologist Dude

customer_reviews.title: Real soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this natural soap, both original and unscented. We like the clean feeling without residue. I got my husband to switch from Zest. Until I make my own I’ll continue to buy kirks.
customer_reviews.author: Apples

customer_reviews.title: It's s good and honest product
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have much of smell but it doesn't smell bad at all. It hasn't dried my skin out so I'm very pleased to have a natural no chemical soap that cleans, and doesn't dry my skin out.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: True eczema Treatment
customer_reviews.text: Creams, and ointments only prolong the itching of eczema. Lathering the irritated area with castile, and do not over rince, let skin air dry, if possible. Clears up irritated area fast. STOPS ITCHING FAST!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rex M. Seiden

customer_reviews.title: Great standard soap
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make homemade laundry detergent. They were perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Very good soap! Nice scent and good for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this soap for 2 years now and am very pleased with it. I feel clean and don't get itchy afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a soap that didn't irritate my ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a soap that didn't irritate my skin, didn't have questionable ingredients in it (check the environmental working group - it's rated very low), and didn't cost a fortune. This one checks all the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy should have been fragrance free!
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd time I ordered this product. The 1st my order was correct and I received fragrance free soap. I ordered the same product again and it was Fresh Scent and I cannot return it. Extremely unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Love this soap, doesn’t break me out from unnecessary fragrances and doesn’t dry my skin out either. Will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Castile soap has a natural scent all it’s own. Not in your face or offensive. I used this to make homemade laundry soap, and have used it in the shower. Does what it’s supposed to. I do actually prefer my PH neutral body wash, but this is a close second.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Low cost natural soap
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I really like this soap. When you combine this with soft water, it suds up really well and leaves your skin soft. Very affordable and with 99% natural ingredients (per their website), it's a win win. We highly recommend this soap.
customer_reviews.author: IEAngelsfan.

customer_reviews.title: Good soap, but does not last.
customer_reviews.text: I love the soap, but the bars lasted about 5 days each. We usually get two weeks or more out of a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great product, arguably best bar soap available.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and product, I’m saying in my opinion this is best bar soap on the market.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaSteve

customer_reviews.title: Kirks soap
customer_reviews.text: Saw the reviews, bought it, love it, my favorite soap
customer_reviews.author: Fate

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: Kirk's Castile Soap is the cleanest and most effective soap I have ever found, and it is reasonably priced. I discovered the brand at a food co-op many years ago in Mt. Rainer, MD, but when we moved farther away, I could not find it in local stores or co-ops. Thanks to Amazon for making it available. I like the unscented version. Also, the shipment arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer_66

customer_reviews.title: Best soap available. Great lather, fast rinse, safe for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Best soap available. Safe for sensitive skin, no scent. Gorgeous, luxurious lather, rinses very quickly and very cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Luckner

customer_reviews.title: Organic bar soap
customer_reviews.text: This bar soap is made from the most organic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: bwaton

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Leaves me feeling really clean. Good amount of suds. Only downside is it seems to get used up faster than other soap.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Canaan

customer_reviews.title: I am fine with it
customer_reviews.text: Soap the wife likes, whatever, I am fine with it. It don t last as long as other soaps but it suds up good
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Gentle soap
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ingredients, but bar gets used up quickly and is soft. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: ... this as my body soap and it is the best. cleans well and doesn't eave scents or
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my body soap and it is the best. cleans well and doesn't eave scents or residue
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Bar soap
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Best soap. No dyes or perfumes, just soap. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: It is a great multipurpose soap
customer_reviews.text: We use this soap as a family for body wash and I use it to make my own detergent. It is a great multipurpose soap.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L. Melin

customer_reviews.title: Quality soap for a good price
customer_reviews.text: We use this for making laundry soap. It's great quality without the price of soaps like Bronner's.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mama

customer_reviews.title: love this soap
customer_reviews.text: love this soap !! only soap my son or I will use. I even alternate this with my shampoo. my 20 year old said it's the only soap that has ever cleared his breakouts and is keeping them from coming back :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good soap
customer_reviews.text: A good soap, not harsh, free from unwanted colors, perfumes or lotions. Quick delivery and solid packaging. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: etudiant

customer_reviews.title: DRY HANDS! THEY ARE SORE NOW
customer_reviews.text: I used the kirk's castle bar soap with fragrance for years and never experienced a problem with it drying out my hands. Then I decided to switch to this one, THE FRAGRANCE FREE variety. Now my hands hurt, they are extremely dry and I even developed a red rash. What a grave disappointment. Why would the fragrance free do this??? Anyway, I decided to purchase Burt Bee's hand soap instead. Hopefully, it helps my hands get back to normal again...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making laundry detergent. Can't find it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bars don't last long
customer_reviews.text: These clean fine, and I like that they are unscented, but unfortunately they dissolve so quickly that each bar only lasts a few days of two people using for daily showers. I've never seen a bar of soap get used so quickly. The search for a good natural bar soap continues....
customer_reviews.author: L. Richter

customer_reviews.title: Best Vegan Soap
customer_reviews.text: Great vegan soap. We've been using it for years and the quality is always consistently great. Why bathe in animal tallow (dead fat in most commercial brands - Sodium Tallowate) when you can be perfectly clean using Kirk's.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap!
customer_reviews.text: Clean natural soap with more lather than other natural soaps and without any residue. Buy in bulk, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: dasj199

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact is seams to be a healthy choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH GETTING!
customer_reviews.text: I received these bars of soap yesterday and it only lasted through 2 showers! It also burned my virgina! What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Harsh
customer_reviews.text: I'm a diabetic old woman with Sjogren's disease and rosacea. I decided to try this soap because the Environmental Working Groups rates its ingredients as Low Hazard. It truly is unscented, and it does get my skin squeaky clean, but I find it to be harsh and painfully drying. Can't use it. I'll stick with Kiss My Face Naked Pure Olive Oil Moisturizing Bar Soap, which my dermatologist endorses.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: It's soap. Make sure it's the one you order though.
customer_reviews.text: Love that this soap is cruelty free (that's why I bought it) though I wish Amazon would have actually sent me the Fragrance Free ones that I ordered instead of sending me the scented ones I didn't order.. luckily, the scented ones don't make me break out, but the scent isn't pleasant. It kind of reminds me of the cheap sample soaps you get at roadside motels. I unfortunately didn't pay attention before opening the package and now I can't return it. If you order the Fragrance Free soaps, make sure that's what they send you before you open it...
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great soap! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. It actually cleans your skin without drying and doesn't leave chemical residue on your skin or in your shower. Had husband start using this, too, because other well known brands leave soap scum and body oils on the shower floor. Used to have to SCRUB AND SCRUB WITH CHEMICALS to get my shower clean. Using this soap... simple cleaning with vinegar and baking soda get it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Superdog Mom

customer_reviews.title: 12 ct is 4 sets of 3-packs and labelled as such.
customer_reviews.text: I got one as a gift and love it for my kids. I will start to use it after my current soap finishes. Bought a 12-count expecting 12 of what I had, but the packaging differs from the picture. It shows 12 in white wrap instead of the 4 3-packs in shiny, blue-green wrap that arrived. Fine for in-home use but I don't want to gift a bar that says 3-pack on it.
customer_reviews.author: h chen

customer_reviews.title: A fine soap
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this because it is not tested on animals and there are no animal products in it. There's no scent to speak of (other than clean). I have sensitive skin and can use it without problems.
customer_reviews.author: JulieD

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Produces great lather and highly recommended for hand washing but not in the shower or bath tub because the soap is rather harsh on sensitive parts.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L. Bens

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good natural castile soap. My only complaint is that the bars don't seem to last quite as long as standard soap. It's the best value I've been able to find for castile soap. That other brand is just too expensive and Kirk's seems just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan R

customer_reviews.title: Great product for someone looking for minimal chemical additives, but leaves skin very dry.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for someone looking for minimal chemical additives, but leaves skin very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Pterodactyl Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great natural soap
customer_reviews.text: This is a great natural soap with no animal products. Cleans well and rinses clean.
customer_reviews.author: Y.D.

customer_reviews.title: Best soap ever....
customer_reviews.text: it's a coconut oil based soap that cleans without stripping moisture from skin. No sticky residue and no fragrance,makes it a great soap for daily showers.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney C. White

customer_reviews.title: Keeps skin hydrated and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Finally I've found a soap that doesn't strip the oil out of my skin and make me itch after a shower! This soap is great, I'll never go back to the other big brands!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I can’t use scented soaps and there are some unscented soaps that don’t agree with me either. Kirks unscented is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Safe Soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. It's only safe list. It doesn't contain any xeno estrogens, and it is completely fragrance free and hypoallergenic. Works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Use it for everything laundry, hand soap, shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I use this soap to make laundry detergent and it works well. I also use as hand soap and even in a pinch shampoo. Good quality and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Black

customer_reviews.title: OK Soap
customer_reviews.text: My main gripe is that this soap leaves a bit of a white residue.
customer_reviews.author: Azeez

customer_reviews.title: Kirks
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand of soap. Better ingredients than most brands.
customer_reviews.author: Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a very simple soap for my sensitive skin and this is it! Also cruelty free which makes it even better
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grate and safe for use in DIY laundry making
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the scum it leaves behind on my tub
customer_reviews.author: Anne Templeton W

customer_reviews.title: Soap cleans well and does not bother my skin, ...
customer_reviews.text: Soap cleans well and does not bother my skin, but the bar dissolves and disappears quickly if exposed to the air.
customer_reviews.author: jack f.

customer_reviews.title: ... use it in laundry detergent and so far its great. no
customer_reviews.text: I use it in laundry detergent and so far its great. no scent
customer_reviews.author: Survive

customer_reviews.title: Great soap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. Short ingredient list with no chemicals or added fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Helped teen acne.
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. My teen son uses it head to toe and loves it as well. It really helped his moderate teenage acne.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Kieffer

product_meta.title: Kirk's Original Coco Castile Bar Soap Fragrance Free 4 Ounces (12 Pack)
product_meta.description: Scent:Unscented| Size:4 Ounce (Pack of 12)Since 1839, Kirk's Original Coco Castile Soap has given the consumer a high quality, all natural soap at an affordable price. Current national market research ranks Kirk's Original Coco Castile Soap as the top selling all-natural bar soap. "Castile" originally referred to the highly-prized vegetable based soap produced in Castile, Spain. For centuries this soap was considered "the soap of royalty" because of its luxurious lather and gentleness to the skin. Today, "Castile" refers to any vegetable based soap. Why ALL-Natural? - No Animal By-Products - Never Tested on Animals - Hypoallergenic - Biodegradable - No Synthetic Detergents
feature_bullets: ALL-NATURAL SOAP MADE WITH SIMPLE INGREDIENTS WITHOUT THE USE OF ANIMAL BYPRODUCTS leaves skin soft, clean with ingredients you know and trust
HYPOALLERGENIC SOAP IS GENTLE ON SENSITIVE SKIN and suitable for people with sensitivities
BIODEGRADABLE FORMULA CONTAINS NO HARSH SUBSTANCES AND NO SYNTHETIC DETERGENTS, making it a good choice for families looking to live a more eco-friendly lifestyle
CRUELTY-FREE FORMULA is never tested on animals, so you can buy it with confidence
BULK PACKAGE OF 12 BARS MAKES IT EASY TO STOCK UP, so you always have a fresh bar on hand and ready for use
